# XIII Century (series)

XIII Century is a series of real-time tactics computer video games developed by Unicorn Studio and released in 2007.  The series consists of the titles XIII Century: Death or Glory, its stand-alone expansion XIII Century: Blood of Europe, and a XIII Century: Gold release, which combines the two titles. The games are similar in interface and game play to those of the Total War series. The games' single-player campaigns are a series of thematic battles.
